analysis.description:
QuasacoinCodeToken.burnAndConvertToQUA (/unique_chucks/36/0xa3d3bf5f650a47f53bc49f512761d4de15bc0e05.sol#369-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenSmartcontract.mint(msg.sender,_value) (/unique_chucks/36/0xa3d3bf5f650a47f53bc49f512761d4de15bc0e05.sol#371-372)
